name: seneca_scraper
description: A simple tool to track personal expenses in a spread Google spreadsheet
author: federicoweber@gmail.com

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz dist && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf dist
scripts.package-nochrome: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: npm run lint && npm run babel && cp -r package.json dist && npm run copy-credentials && cd dist && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.local: npm run babel && cp -r node_modules dist && cp -r .credentials dist/.credentials && node dist/starter-kit/local.js
